############
Reference
############

Algorithms
----------

- Discrete core-periphery structure 

   - :ref:`borgatti-everett-algorithm`.
   - MINRES 
   - Stochatic block model 
   - LowRankCore
   - LapCore 
   - LapSgnCore 
   - Kojaku-Masuda algorithm

- Continuous core-periphery structure 

   - Rossa algorithm
   - Rombach algorithm
